description:
This app is a launcher for PocketMirror Tasks.  It allows you to open PocketMirror Tasks from outside of PocketMirror.  This app works in conjunction with PocketMirror and requires PocketMirror.
PocketMirror Tasks is included with PocketMirror.  PocketMirror Tasks is the premier task / to-do management app for webOS. Synchronizing Outlook Tasks with PocketMirror Tasks gives you an effective and intuitive task manager on your webOS device.
PocketMirror Tasks features include:
- Enhanced webOS task app.
- Alarms with variable snooze options.
- Recurrence patterns. 
- Regenerating/Repeating tasks.
- Group and sort tasks, by date, priority, and alphabetically.
- View tasks by categories.
- Designed with GTD / Getting Things Done users in mind.
- Advanced search.
- And much, much more.  Install PocketMirror and try it today for free.
Wi-Fi is required to use PocketMirror.  USB not supported.  PocketMirror is $39.95 to purchase and is a free upgrade to current owners.
